author: werner
msg: Add a System.exit(0) call at the end of the main method. This avoids an abnormal termination when using W32 and a DLL.

author: imario
msg: Changed to treat a file as file it is a special file like socket or fifo.
Treat a file as file even if java.io.File.exists() returns false but its length is > 0 (hiberfil.sys on windows)
Thanks to Robert and Anton for pointing it out

author: jorton
msg: hostname-mismatch warning for valid wildcard certs.
